movie_title: The school that puts the kids in charge ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: What happens when you put the kids in charge of the school? Phil and Georgie discuss this and teach

vocabulary.example: At the Bamboo School, children are responsible for disciplining their fellow students.
The Bamboo School is both conventional in some ways and radical in others.
The Bamboo School is innovative in allowing children to run the school.

vocabulary.definition: fundamental or extreme; favoring drastic political, economic, or social reforms
vocabulary.example: The idea of children running the school is considered radical by many.

vocabulary.definition: having the distinctive qualities of a particular type of person or thing
vocabulary.example: The Bamboo School provides children with experiences that are more typical of the real world.

vocabulary.definition: work done without pay to help people in a community
vocabulary.example: Students at the Bamboo School engage in two hours of community service every week.
